thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 24 of 99
thread.title: Ben

author: Ben
title: Ben
text: I truly wish there was an SSENSE in NYC because from my experience, this site is one of the best out there for your high fashion needs. They get just about all of the latest releases, customer service is great, they're very kind, and in general the selection of brands is fantastic. Not to mention all the interesting articles they put out. I genuinely love this store and it's my go to online, even more-so than Barney's, the selection here is just cooler. Definitely a site that's worth your time.
